Description: Plotting a sine wave using Matplotlib
Code:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# Create data
x = np.linspace(0, 10, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

# Plot data
plt.plot(x, y)
plt.xlabel("X-axis")
plt.ylabel("Y-axis")
plt.title("Sine Wave")
plt.show()

Description: Making a GET request using the requests library
Code:
import requests

# Make a GET request
response = requests.get("https://api.github.com")

# Print the status code
print(response.status_code)
